content.description: Sit start at bottom of blunt overhanging corner (start farther to the right if you want, but I decided not to brush the lichen). Climb up on jugs, moving left to gain the slab and top out. A direct topout adding 1-2 extra numbers is there, but it seems kind of heinous.
content.protection: two pads solo or one with spotter
content.location: Go down into the valley around the small rocky overlook after the wooden sign. There is a small seasonal creek; the boulder is north of this creek and downhill of some dirty slab cracks. Approaching the boulder from the south, it looks dramatically like a wave, hence the name. Is this the Wave Boulder?

content.description: Mostly choss, but could be part of one of the named areas. Please move if needed, but it would be nice if some directions were clearer.
